trans-unit.resname: ZNR·239 | Verazol, the Split Current | Card Name
ZNR·239 | Verazol, the Split Current | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each mana spent to cast it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为施放它时用来支付费用的法术力数量。

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·239 | Verazol, the Split Current | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a kicked spell, you may remove two +1/+1 counters from Verazol. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放已增幅的咒语时，你可以从威拉佐上移去两个+1/+1指示物。若你如此作，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。（永久物咒语的复制品会成为衍生物。）

trans-unit.source: When Yasharn enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic Forest card and a basic Plains card, reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: ZNR·240 | Yasharn, Implacable Earth | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 牌手不能以支付生命或牺牲非地永久物的方式施放咒语或起动异能。
